title: How Do You Self Mystery Gift?
body: I saw in the monsters challenge that self mystery gifting was available how do you do it?

replies.body:
Go into the storefront.

Don't go anywhere, stay in the "Featured" section.

See that "Double Legendary Chance Mystery Skin"?

That's your man.
is its still working now because I had a holiday

> [{quoted}](name=elemental cora6,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Y7JJJdEa,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-02-25T09:42:34.729+0000)
>
> is its still working now because I had a holiday

Unfortunately no. You can not self-mystery yourself by default. That option is only something they would open during certain events unfortunately. Ocean Week has already concluded I'm afraid.

Though you could have 2 accounts, the other being the proxy, and you use the proxy to gift yourself mystery. This is a way to "self mystery" when the option isn't open.

Or you can have someone who you trust and have a few changes to spare, and you 2 mystery trade each other.
